docs.lead_paragraph: Following is the third and final set of responses from Dr. Harold Koplewicz, a child and adolescent psychiatrist and president of the Child Study Center Foundation. This week he has responded to readers' questions about the myths and stigma surrounding psychiatric disorders of children and adolescents.
docs.abstract: Taking Questions: Dr. Harold Koplewicz, a child and adolescent psychiatrist and president of the Child Study Center Foundation, responds to readers.
docs.snippet: Taking Questions: Dr. Harold Koplewicz, a child and adolescent psychiatrist and president of the Child Study Center Foundation, responds to readers.
